summary: The diff does not show a revert to a prior known-good version; instead it adds/changes frontend functionality (Oisy wallet flows, new error boundary, new smoke-test checklist doc, and other UI/feature work). There is no evidence of backend reversion or of the deployment-failing changes being undone.

missing_requirements.requirement: Revert the application codebase (frontend + backend) to the most recent known-good version that successfully deployed, undoing the changes that led to the current deployment failure.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows new/modified frontend code and new files being added, but provides no evidence of reverting to a previous known-good state, nor any backend changes/reverts. The change set appears additive rather than a rollback.

missing_requirements.requirement: After reverting, run a smoke test of the primary user journeys to confirm the reverted build is functional: connect wallet, view Dashboard, navigate to Send, Receive, Contacts, History, and Contracts.
missing_requirements.reason: A smoke-test checklist document was added, but the diff cannot evidence that a smoke test was actually executed after a revert (and a revert itself is not evidenced).

hallucinated_features.description: Added a new React error boundary with a custom fallback UI and reload behavior.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest asked to revert to a last known working version and avoid new features beyond what is required for deployability; adding a new error boundary is an additive feature not explicitly requested as part of a revert.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced/expanded Oisy Wallet connection UX states (connecting screen, unavailable-state UI with Visit/Try Again buttons) and related UI logic changes in App routing/auth flow.
hallucinated_features.reason: The request is to revert to a previously working deployment; the diff reflects additional/changed wallet flow UI rather than a rollback.

hallucinated_features.description: Implemented a new React Query-based actor hook (useOisyActor) with query invalidation/refetch behavior keyed on identity principal.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in the revert-focused BuildRequest and appears to be new/modified functionality rather than restoration of a prior known-good snapshot.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a new smoke-test checklist document (process documentation).
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-27 requires running a smoke test; adding a document is not the same as executing it, and the document itself is not explicitly requested as an output artifact.
